title: Which US president had the most assassination attempts on them? - Quora
tags: Presidents of the United States of America
History of the United States of America
Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Don't know to be honest. There have been many plots, conspiracies, and attempts that have been uncovered that to this day the United States Secret Service doesn't talk about.
I believe that it was President Gerald Ford (who had at least two attempts upon his life).
